name: Out of Ink (randomhuman97)
description:
You are a sentient blob of paint, your goal is to survive as long as possible by collecting jars of colored ink until you eventually dry up.

Left: Jar of ink, Right: Player

 However, you are clumsy and spill the jars of ink when you collect them,  creating an obstacle. You can wipe the spills with the mop, which you obtain every few jars of ink.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Movement

Z: Use mop
